excerpt: Three film students stalk a bear poacher into the Norwegian wilderness and stumble into Norway’s best-kept secret: trolls are real, and someone has to kill them.
title: Troll Hunter

excerpt: The survivors of the first film, now in college, struggle to identify a copycat killer carving through the student body.
title: Scream 2

excerpt: An English couple arrive on a remote Spanish island to find it deserted except for the children.
title: Who Can Kill a Child?

excerpt: A teen reanimates his dead girlfriend with a secret military chemical, but she wakes up craving human flesh.
title: Return of the Living Dead III

excerpt: Desperate to rival her beautiful stepsister for a Prince’s affections, a young woman resorts to grotesque means to transform her face and body.
title: The Ugly Stepsister
